import React, { Component } from 'react'; import BigScreenDevices from '../Components/BigScreenDevices' import BiggerScreenDevices from '../Components/BiggerScreenDevices' import TabletDevices from '../Components/TabletDevices' import MobileDevices from '../Components/MobileDevices' class Products extends Component{ products = [ "../assets/images/p2_Redvelvet_cake.jpg", ] forBigScreen(){ return ( <>

Our Products

) } forSmallerScreen(){ return ( <>

Our Products

) } render(){ return ( <> {this.forBigScreen()} {this.forBigScreen()} {this.forSmallerScreen()} {this.forSmallerScreen()} ) } } export default Products
